scripts.dev:all: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "$ErrorActionPreference='Stop'; npm run build; $oldPid = (Get-NetTCPConnection -State Listen -LocalPort 3001 -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Select-Object -First 1 -ExpandProperty OwningProcess); if ($oldPid) { Stop-Process -Id $oldPid -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue }; $server = Start-Process node -ArgumentList 'dist/server/index.js' -NoNewWindow -PassThru; try { npm run dev } finally { if ($server -and (Get-Process -Id $server.Id -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue)) { Stop-Process -Id $server.Id -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue } }"
